prompts.prompt: Find all countries matching: {query}. Show for each country: name, capital, region, population, and country code.

template.name: find-countries-by-query
template.title: Find countries by query
template.description: Searches countries by name, code, or other keywords.

arguments.name: query
arguments.description: Any part of a country name, code, capital, or region.

prompts.prompt: Show all available details for the country: {countryName}. Include at least: capital, region, subregion, population, area, official languages, currency, and flag image.

template.name: show-country-details
template.title: Show country details
template.description: Displays detailed info for a single country.

prompts.prompt: Compare the following two countries: {countryA} and {countryB}. Show for both: capital, population, area, region, and currency. Highlight key differences.

template.name: compare-two-countries
template.title: Compare two countries
template.description: Compares main facts between two countries.

prompts.prompt: List the top {count} countries in the {region} region, ranked by {feature}. Show name, capital, and value of the chosen feature.

template.name: top-countries-by-feature
template.title: Top countries by feature
template.description: Shows a ranking of countries within a region based on a chosen feature (e.g. population, area).

arguments.name: feature
arguments.description: Feature to rank on (e.g. population, area).

prompts.prompt: Show all official languages spoken in countries within the {region} region. List each language and the countries where it is official.

template.name: list-languages-by-region
template.title: List languages by region
template.description: Lists official languages for all countries in a given region.
